All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CreateMoodEventFragment
This Fragment class is designed to display a Mood Event Card, and let users Create a mood.
CreateMoodScreen
Deprecated.
CURRENTLY: THIS CLASS IS NOT BEING USED, INSTEAD IS REPLACED BY SelectMoodDialogFragment
DeleteMoodDialogListener
Interface used to implement updating a mood Mostly copied from Lab 7
DeleteMoodFragment
This class is used for deleting moods
EditMoodFragment
This class is used for editing moods
EmotionalStates
This is a class that represents the emotional state of the user.
FeedFragment
This fragment class is designed to display all the moods in the database.
LogInFragment
LogInFragment is the starting point of application and allows user to login to their account using Firebase
MainActivity
MainActivity is the entry point for the Little Blue Notebook app which launches the initial Login page and initializes Firebase Firestore It also sets up the navigation and fragment management for the app's main UI flow.
Mood
This is a class that represents every mood post the user creates.
MoodArrayAdapter
This class is a custom array adapter for the Mood class.
MoodDialogListener
Interface used to implement updating a mood Mostly copied from Lab 7
MoodHistoryFragment
This fragment class is designed to display a list of posted moods by a given user.
MoodProvider
This class is in charge of reflecting new/updated/deleted data between the app and the database
MoodProvider.DataStatus
All methods in this interface must be implemented by the caller of MoodProvider
SelectMoodDialogFragment
This class extends DialogFragment, and will display the mood wheel when a user wants to create or edit a mood event.
SelectMoodDialogFragment.MoodSelectionListener
Interface for the fragment
SignUpFragment
SignUpFragment handles creating a new account and storing the users credentials in Firebase Database.
SocialSituations
This enum can be used to represent social situations in user Moods.
UserMoodArrayAdapter
This class is a custom array adapter for the Mood class.
UserProfile
This is a class to hold user information (pulled from 4-us-030101 on 3/7/25 ~10pm).
